name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Technical Engineer with over 13 years of experience in Mechanical Engineering and Pressure Vessel Design. Proven track record in Project Management and conducting Production Audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations. Skilled in Technical Reporting and creating precise Engineering Drawings, with exceptional Analytical Skills to identify and implement effective Root Cause Analysis. Strong negotiation and communication skills, fostering collaboration across teams while maintaining confidentiality.
Additionally, I possess a background in technology and engineering processes. I am adept at delivering high-performance applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have hands-on expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while also implementing **microservices**, event-driven architectures, and **CI/CD pipelines**.
